title: Arabian Nights: Sindbad no Bouken (TV)
synopsis: Based on the famous tale from The Thousand and One Arabian Nights, this story takes place more than 1200 years ago. The story's hero is the impish Sindbad, a mischievous boy full of curiosity, who one night sneaks into the royal palace to watch the acrobatic performances and learns that a wide world awaits beyond Baghdad.
voices: ['Ohara, Noriko', 'Kamiya, Akira', 'Shiraishi, Fuyumi', 'Takahashi, Kazue', 'Mine, Eken', 'Sugiyama, Kazuko', 'Hori, Junko', 'Yada, Kouji', 'Yanami, Jouji', 'Masuyama, Eiko']
staff: [['Kurokawa, Fumio', ['Director', ' Episode Director']], ['Urakami, Yasuo', ['Sound Director']], ['Kaneko, Yutaka', ['Script']], ['Horie, Mitsuko', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
